location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Notes by Lewis Pelly on Mr M Khamkoff's mission in Afghanistan

mods.abstract: Draft notes written by Lewis Pelly on the effects of the visit of Russian Officers to Herat, including the financial donations made, and the mission of M Khamkoff, a Russian whose route Pelly followed for a time.Mr Khamkoff's mission is discussed in detail in the notes, along with Pelly's own comments on each part of the mission; and both the Russian Government's intentions towards Herat and the Persian Government's attempts to use Sultan Ahmed Khan of Candahar [KandahƒÅr] and the Ameer [Amir] of Herat for their own benefits.The notes are in draft form and contain numerous crossings through, corrections, and additional notes and paragraphs in the margins.
